Blog Meetings

Tuesday, March 25th, 2014

by Peter, March 21, 2014

New Node Request

The seventh meeting will be taking place at xCubicle, a local hackerspace in the Lower East Side. Our new home also means a new meeting time: Tuesday at 7pm. So if you were unable to attend our previous meetings, I hope the new time works.

If you plan to make it, please RSVP on the Uniiverse page. If you share the event on Facebook or Twitter, the $5 RSVP fee will be waived. (For those worried, you can target the appropriate friends on Facebook before it gets shared.)

Hope to see you all at the new time and place!

xCubicle
25 Essex St
New York, NY 10002
Tuesday, March 25th, 2014 at 7pm

Site built with Jekyll, Bootstrap and Mapbox.
